headerDisplay: Control multiple Bosch Smart Home devices through room climate control of the BSHC API

systemPassword.title: System password (base64 encoded)
systemPassword.description: The system password of your Bosch Smart Home Controller (BSHC)

host.title: Host
host.description: The host name / IP Address of BSHC (e.g. 192.168.0.10)

clientName.title: Client name
clientName.description: The name for the homebridge client that is shown in the Bosch Smart Home app ('OSS ' prefix is added automatically)

clientId.title: Client identifier
clientId.description: Generated automatically if not provided ('oss_' prefix is added automatically)

clientCert.title: Client certificate (base64 encoded content only without BEGIN/END)
clientCert.description: Generated automatically if possoble, unless provided here

clientKey.title: Client private key (base64 encoded content only without BEGIN/END, 2048bit)
clientKey.description: Generated automatically if possible, unless provided here

periodicUpdates.title: Refresh all accessories after specified amount of minutes (0 or lower = disabled)
periodicUpdates.description: The plugin reacts to changes of accessories, a periodic refresh is not required and does not disable event based updates through long polling
